short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that gives everybody on twitter a checkmark

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you miss your old checkmark, or want to hide from your friends that you paid for a checkmark on Twitter? Well now you can hide, by giving everybody a checkmark!
